subject: Pedal set
description_text:
If I already have the plus x pedal set with control box and power supply I don’t need the power supply if I want haptics right? 

Thank you,
Dave

conversations.body_text: Hello, the Plus X control box and power supply are both required because the current provided by the USB port is too small to support haptics operation. If you purchase the haptics  set, the power supply is included.
